column1: Vordaman worked as an engineer for the Navy for many years in a number of areas
column2: specializing in the design of hydrofoils. He worked at Naval Coastal Systems Center for 26 years
column3: and in 1984 received the Commanding Officer Technical Director Annual Award for Superior Achievement in Engineering. He was a member of the Panama City Yacht Club
column4: Society of Naval Architects & Marine Engineers and the First Presbyterian Church.
